word:
"I Am But a Little Child" [PUBLISHED FIRST 
            IN SPECIAL TESTIMONIES, SERIES B, 
               NO. 10, JEHOVAH IS OUR KING.] 


     At the beginning of his reign Solomon prayed: "O Lord my God, Thou hast made Thy servant king instead of David my father: and I am but a little child: I know not how to go out or come in." 1 Kings 3:7.
